mock_interviews.title: Mock Interview — Java Developer
mock_interviews.description: Master Java programming fundamentals, object-oriented design, and enterprise development patterns.
mock_interviews.instructions: 60 minutes. Includes MCQs, short design prompts, and one coding task in Java.

mock_interviews.title: Mock Interview — Python Developer
mock_interviews.description: Learn Python programming, data structures, algorithms, and web development with Django/Flask.
mock_interviews.instructions: 50 minutes. MCQs and one coding task; focus on Pythonic solutions.

mock_interviews.title: Mock Interview — Frontend Developer
mock_interviews.description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and modern frontend development practices.
mock_interviews.instructions: 55 minutes. MCQs, DOM/CSS problems, and a small implementation task.

mock_interviews.title: Mock Interview — Data Scientist
mock_interviews.description: Learn data analysis, machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization.
mock_interviews.instructions: 75 minutes. MCQs, short analytical problems, and one coding/data task.

mock_interviews.title: Mock Interview — System Design Engineer
mock_interviews.description: Master distributed systems, scalability, microservices, and system architecture patterns.
mock_interviews.instructions: 90 minutes. Design prompts and discussion-based questions; include one architecture diagram task.

mock_interviews.title: Mock Interview — DevOps Engineer
mock_interviews.description: Learn CI/CD pipelines, containerization, cloud platforms, and infrastructure automation.
mock_interviews.instructions: 60 minutes. MCQs, short scenario-based tasks, and one practical automation task.
